briefTitle: Anesthetic Effect on Immune Cell in Patients With Cancer
officialTitle: Anesthetic Effect on Immune Cell in Patients With Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: immune cell (NK cell and CD8+ T cell)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patient who was planned to undergo breast cancer surgery.

Exclusion Criteria:

* age \< 20 years old
* history of hypersensitivity reaction in propofol or sevoflurane
* history of previous cancer
* patient with ongoing inflammation
